Posts.Content: My aunt(39) came to know about stage 3 breast tumour on 13 Nov 2009 and was operated on Feb 2011. After that she got 3 chemos and she lost her eyesight. All testreports are normal and doctors r not able to detect the disease.Even no cancer cell is found in the body. She is getting weak day by day . Plz suggest something What to do?? Her body shivers and headaches all the day.
Posts.Title: Brain problems after breast cancer
